about_the_game:
Did you know the idea for Leximan was conceived in the middle of a chaotic tabletop campaign? This TTRPG Mini Campaign is a tribute to those glorious origins.

Bring Leximan back to the table with Basement Breakout and indulge your taste for mayhem.

Pick between pre-created wizards. Your hat is very important to this campaign. I'm serious. You should regard it as fondly as if it were your own child.

STORY:
The Academy Elementinia is a magical academy smack-bang in the middle of wild magic wastelands and forests, where lost wizards find their way or are one day born. It is full of many accomplished spellcasters. Unfortunately, you aren’t one of them.

Rejects such as yourself - known as ‘Learners’ - do not get to enjoy the prestigious upper floors of the dungeon. You have been sent down here by the irritatingly gifted, handsome and fabulous Principal Elementine, who works tirelessly to ensure you don’t get to see the light of the glorious tunnels above.

You have been planning an escape for a while now, waiting for a chaotic moment to distract Elementine’s goons and golems from your stroke of genius.

Your character will be low level to represent your perceived weakness. Seeing as you’re a reject, feel free to make any type of character at all! A fighter or barbarian sent to the basement for being brutish makes just as much sense as a failed wizard.

You and your group of misfits have been arranging an escape from the wretched Learners’ Basement for quite a while now. Now that wild magic is consuming the place, it’s your perfect opportunity to sneak away to the esteemed upper floors in the chaos! Though be quick — as the distraction won’t last forever!

DETAILS:
  • A TTRPG Mini Campaign.
  • Expected Session Length: 2-3 Sessions.
  • PDF file.
  • Quite peculiar.
